title: Create FO-06 affirmation and summary agents
description:
Create affirmation and summary agents for FO-06.

Files to create:
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-06/affirmation-agent.ts` - Copy from FO-05, update agent ID
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-06/summary-agent.ts` - Copy from FO-05, update agent ID
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-06/index.ts` - Export all agents

These can largely mirror FO-05 implementations - just update:
- Agent IDs to use 'fo-06-' prefix
- Any references to FO-05

Reference: `src/mastra/agents/fo-05/`

⚠️ Do not close until all agent files exist and export correctly.
closed_reason: Created affirmation-agent.ts, summary-agent.ts, and index.ts with fo-06 prefixes
